      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Genome cross(Genome pere, Genome mere, double rate)
      Return a new Genome, genes from mere with a rate % chance and pere with a (1-rate) % chance pere and mere must share the same structure
      java.util.ArrayList<Genome> crossPop(java.util.ArrayList<Genome> population, int part)
      cross a population (list of genomes).

      • cross

        public Genome cross(Genome pere,
                    Genome mere,
                    double rate)
        Return a new Genome, genes from mere with a rate % chance and pere with a (1-rate) % chance pere and mere must share the same structure
        Parameters:
        pere -
        mere -
        rate - must be between 0 and 1
        Returns:

      • crossPop

        public java.util.ArrayList<Genome> crossPop(java.util.ArrayList<Genome> population,
                                            int part)
        cross a population (list of genomes). The population has to be of an even size. The parents are chosen step by step at random within the population until no more parents are available
        Parameters:
        population -
        Returns:
